summary: A woman and a man awake in individual white cells in an abandoned prison or mental institution wearing only underwear and without any memory. They hear a strange and creepy noise and decide... See full summary »
cast: James Marsters|Tony Todd|Marc Winnick|Natasha Alam|Diahnna Nicole Baxter|Jolene Blalock|Richard Whiten|Jennie Ford|Dino Fekaris
title: Shadow Puppets
